verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ch'oxcaneli to malaj in mul, yujto anhej tas wach' ayoch t'a in pensar in k'ulani. Mamin, ayach och yipoc in k'ool, malaj in chab'k'olal t'ayach.
Mamin, ilin, b'eytzitej in pensar yet' tas tzin nib'ej.
Yujto max b'atcanlaj a wach'k'olal satk'olal vuuj, tzach in k'anab'ajejnhej.
Manh junnhejoclaj tzin ek' yet' eb' ixtum anima. Malaj b'aj junnhej tzin ek' yet' eb' chab' sat.
Tzin yajcanel smolchajelal eb' chuk chi'. Val yel malaj b'aj wach' vak'an yet' eb' tz'ixtanb'at wach' b'eyb'al.
Tzin b'iquel in k'ab' yuj in ch'oxaneli to malaj in chukal. Ichato chi' b'ian tzin ek' oyoyoc t'a spatic yichanh altar,
svalan wach' lolonel t'a b'ital, svalanel masanil tas satub'tac tza b'o'o.
Mamin Jehová, tzin xajanej a templo b'aj cajan ach eq'ui. Ata' tz'alchajel snivanil elk'ochi.
Manh iq'uel in q'uinal yet' eb' sk'ulan chukal. Manh in a satel yet' eb' milum anima,
yujto anhej chukal snib'ej eb' sk'ulej, b'ecan sk'ol eb' schaan q'uen tumin yic smontaji.
Ha inxo jun, tzin nib'ej tzin b'eynhej t'a in wach'ilal, yuj chi' colinel Mamin, ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayin,
yic tek'annhej vaj t'a b'eyb'al wach'. Mamin Jehová, ol val wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a skal eb' molanek' t'a ichanh.
